selected_quotes: Important paper: 74% of climate change is anthropogenic [Nature Geoscience]

Is global warming natural? Not likely. See This peer-reviewed research paper is available online.
Muller's Koch-fueled study gets right answer, badly. Here's how it should be done: in journals, building on prior work.

source.name: Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change
source.description: The Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) is the leading international body for the assessment of climate change. It reviews and assesses the most recent scientific, technical and socio-economic information produced worldwide relevant to the understanding of climate change.
